.. _references-ref:

##########
References
##########


|PROJECT| citations in academic journals:


- Geffen, N, Scholz, SM. 2018. How various design decisions on matching
  individuals in relationships affect the outcomes of microsimulations of
  sexually transmitted infection epidemics. PLoS ONE 13(8):
  e0202516. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0202516

- Geffen, N. and Scholz, S. 2017. Efficient and Effective Pair-Matching
  Algorithms for Agent-Based Models. Journal of Artificial Societies and Social
  Simulation 20(4) 8, 2017 Doi:10.18564/jasss.348.
  http://jasss.soc.surrey.ac.uk/20/4/8.html
